solution_line_template: First find how many pearls Jamie collects per dive by multiplying the number of oysters by the chance each oyster has a pearl: {pearl_probability} pearls/oyster * {oysters_per_dive} oysters/dive = {pearls_per_dive} pearls/dive

Then divide the number of pearls he wants by the number of pearls per dive to find the number of dives: {pearls_needed} pearls / {pearls_per_dive} pearls/dive = <<{pearls_needed}/{pearls_per_dive}={dives_needed}>>{pearls_per_dive} pearls/dive
